Not a team comp, there are 6 primary roles and they're just short 1.
What's the 6th role? lol
Tank, Mage, Fighter, Marksman, Assassin, and **Support**.

I don't see how that's relevant at all.  Vel'Koz can be played support, and a very good support at that.  Labeling him as a support wouldn't change anything at all.

You don't need 6 primary roles if there are 5 slots.
I would had thought Cho'Gath would had been a better pick for support...

Not really.  Cho'Gath has dodgeable CC, is very mana hungry, needs CS to proc his passive, and needs kills or CS to get stacks on his R.

Vel'Koz is great because his passive scales with level, not items, so he'll always do more damage than other poke supports in the game.  His poke is pretty easy to get off, and he has a great teamfighting ultimate that doesn't fall off because of his passive.

He's like a DotA 2 support, in DotA 2, abilities don't scale with anything besides rank, so supports are usually burst mages that don't need items.  Just like Vel'Koz.

Oh yes, I can already see the irony.

Mordekaiser's Q is totally different, his W acts completely differently, he can now have the dragon as a pet, and he goes in a completely different role than he used too.

Darius got his passive completely changed, his Q got changed, his W got changed, his E got a QoL change, and his ultimate got changed.  I don't want to go into literally all of the changes, but all of them are significant enough to mention.

Skarner got a totally different passive, a lot of stat changes, his E got his old passive, I don't remember anything else because I never bothered to read up on it.

Garen didn't get changed that much, except for a lot of numbers shifting around and getting an entirely new mechanic on his ultimate.

Garen MIGHT be considered to have gotten small changes, besides that, no, they were all quite significant.

And how is Mordekaiser not as updated as Tristana?  Did she not keep pretty much everything except the one change in her kit that gave her a bomb?

It's unfair to bring up Sion, he got a complete relaunch and was changed more than any other champion ever has been in the game.
